ModMetaData.name: [GMT] More Vanilla Mineable Resources
ModMetaData.author: Grizzlemethis
ModMetaData.description:
Mod that adjust's the amount of resources you receive when mining vanilla resources.
Component - 50% Increase Gold - 50% Increase Jade - 50% Increase Plasteel - 50% Increase Silver - 25% Increase Steel - 50% Increase Uranium - 50% Increase
